mapper.insert: insert into expenses(e_no, c_id, m_id, e_title, e_sdate, e_edate, e_total) values(#{e_no}, #{c_id}, #{m_id}, #{e_title}, #{e_sdate}, #{e_edate}, #{e_total})
mapper.update: update expenses set e_total = #{total} where e_no=#{e_no}
mapper.select: select c.c_id "c_id", c.c_name "c_name", c.C_FILENAME "c_filename" from course c, member m where c.m_id = m.m_id AND m.M_ID = #{id}
